channel.title: [317]Rune-Optix[317] Bringing back the old RS2
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.bannerfans.com/][img]http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/2053/6805682f13b1300m3.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center][center]Hi, I'm Runes Are Cool? - obviously...I'm not that well known in the community; but I am very involved when it comes to servers. For a good bit of time now, I've been searching and searching for atleast one server that would resemble the 'old' RuneScape - when it was actually fun to play, but mostly all of them weren't what I was looking for - and the ones that I [b]did[/b] find that were what I was looking for either had horrible staff, or shut down 2-3 days after I started playing them. SO, what do I do? I make my own server, how I think I server should be ran.
[font=comic sans ms]Programmers:[/font] - Cody (me) - Alex (not known on this forum)
Right now, my server is still in development, but give me a little bit of time and Rune Optix will be up and running. Below is what I expect of the server, what I'm using to create this server, and some pictures of the server in development (which I will update probably every 1 or 2 days).
[font=comic sans ms]The server:[/font]
[ul][li]Base: Cleaned Delta, but we're re-coding a lot of material...so it won't be much like the usual DeltaScape servers you see.[/li] [li]Client: I'm not sure what client I'm going to use, it depends on what I will need for the server, and which will be easier for me to code.[/li] [li]Programming Experience: About 2 years, almost 3.[/li][/ul] [font=comic sans ms]What [b]I[/b] expect of the server when it is released:[/font]
[ul][li]A great, stable economy - not one that is "decent" like most servers[/li] [li]An excellent Pk population - not just a few players pking at a time, I want the wilderness to be full, I want the fear to come back, so that when you enter the deeper wild, you see clans running around, and leaders saying "DD OR DIE!" :rolleyes: [/li] [li]A reliable staff team - a team of respectful staff who don't abuse their powers - who actually help players out, but still play the game at the same time [/li] [li]An active community that will go far![/li] [li]I want to be a [b]long-lasting[/b] server, that is worthwhile[/li][/ul] [font=comic sans ms]Pictures & Development:[/font] [b]--More pictures and development updates soon! I'll be adding them day to day!--[/b]
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac134/RuneOptix/1.jpg[/img]
[font=comic sans ms]Again, I've just started to develope this server, so give me some time, and it will eventually be up! Again, I will be making day-to-day updates to this thread, so check back every so often if you're interested in this server development!
I could always use an extra hand, and I'll probably be creating a development team soon, so if you'd like to help, have questions, I'm always on MSN: tarheels4848@yahoo.com[/font] [/center]

You just downloaded DeltaCleaned and didn’t change the name as you can see in the last picture and downloaded Muroth’s Old Client Gameframe from Google.

We’ve been doing the MAJOR THINGS first - not the small things.
/facepalm
[/quote]and those are?
Changing the login message and compiling?

OHNAICE!

Mate, this guy didn’t even start being tight to you, so why start on him?
You just started being a bitch on his thread, no need for it man.[/quote]Hey, guess what.
FUCK YOU!

item.title: [317]Rune-Optix[317] Bringing back the old RS2
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

[center]

[/center][center]Hi, I’m Runes Are Cool? - obviously…I’m not that well known in the community; but I am very involved when it comes to servers. For a good bit of time now, I’ve been searching and searching for atleast one server that would resemble the ‘old’ RuneScape - when it was actually fun to play, but mostly all of them weren’t what I was looking for - and the ones that I did find that were what I was looking for either had horrible staff, or shut down 2-3 days after I started playing them. SO, what do I do? I make my own server, how I think I server should be ran.

[font=comic sans ms]Programmers:[/font]

  • Cody (me)
  • Alex (not known on this forum)

Right now, my server is still in development, but give me a little bit of time and Rune Optix will be up and running. Below is what I expect of the server, what I’m using to create this server, and some pictures of the server in development (which I will update probably every 1 or 2 days).

[font=comic sans ms]The server:[/font]

[ul][li]Base: Cleaned Delta, but we’re re-coding a lot of material…so it won’t be much like the usual DeltaScape servers you see.[/li]
[li]Client: I’m not sure what client I’m going to use, it depends on what I will need for the server, and which will be easier for me to code.[/li]
[li]Programming Experience: About 2 years, almost 3.[/li][/ul]
[font=comic sans ms]What I expect of the server when it is released:[/font]

[ul][li]A great, stable economy - not one that is “decent” like most servers[/li]
[li]An excellent Pk population - not just a few players pking at a time, I want the wilderness to be full, I want the fear to come back, so that when you enter the deeper wild, you see clans running around, and leaders saying “DD OR DIE!” :rolleyes: [/li]
[li]A reliable staff team - a team of respectful staff who don’t abuse their powers - who actually help players out, but still play the game at the same time [/li]
[li]An active community that will go far![/li]
[li]I want to be a long-lasting server, that is worthwhile[/li][/ul]
[font=comic sans ms]Pictures & Development:[/font]
–More pictures and development updates soon! I’ll be adding them day to day!–









1.jpg752×499

[font=comic sans ms]Again, I’ve just started to develope this server, so give me some time, and it will eventually be up! Again, I will be making day-to-day updates to this thread, so check back every so often if you’re interested in this server development!

I could always use an extra hand, and I’ll probably be creating a development team soon, so if you’d like to help, have questions, I’m always on MSN: tarheels4848@yahoo.com[/font]
[/center]

Read full topic
